original_title: 13: The Life & Career of Ted Christopher
overview: Ted Christopher was, and still is, known as one of the greatest Modified drivers of all-time. His incredible skills behind the wheel, his polarizing driving style, and his personality both on and off the track made Ted one of the most unique characters at the track. A person we lost way too soon. Get to learn more about the man New England Modified fans call "The King" in this full-length documentary!
tagline: The Life & Career of Ted Christopher
title: 13: The Life & Career of Ted Christopher
